message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. It's a great deal and I'm confident it will be worth more than that to you. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, I appreciate the offer, but I'm only willing to pay $12,500 for the product. It's a fair price considering my budget and the product's value to me.  Let me know if you're open to this.
Bob, I understand your budget, but I can't go that low.  How about we meet in the middle at $13,500? It's a fair price considering the value of the product.  Let's see if we can come to an agreement.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $13,500 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm sticking with my original counteroffer of $12,500.  If you're not able to go lower, I'll have to consider other options.
